function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of physical exercise during the COVID-19 lockdown causing physical health problems and susceptibility to severe form of COVID-19","Impact":"Increased risk of severe illness and higher mortality if infected with COVID-19","Mitigation":"Encouraging and enabling moderate physical exercise, especially for those with existing health conditions","Technologies":"Health and fitness apps for home workouts, virtual fitness classes","People":"Individuals, especially those with existing health conditions","Owner":"Health organizations, government health agencies"},{"Description":"Lack of facilities and time constraints due to quarantine, self-isolation, and lockdown hindering physical activities","Impact":"Significantly reduced physical activity and negative effects on mental health and well-being","Mitigation":"Promoting non-physical exercises, providing resources for at-home activities, and addressing motivation challenges","Technologies":"Online platforms for positive thinking exercises and meditation, virtual art classes, home workout videos","People":"Population under quarantine, self-isolation, and lockdown","Owner":"Health and wellness organizations, community centers"}]}
